com.saxonica.ee.schema

Class DistinctFacet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.saxonica.ee.schema.Facet
      • com.saxonica.ee.schema.DistinctFacet

  • public class DistinctFacet
extends Facet
    The saxon:distinct facet on a list type can be used to constrain the list to contain distinct values.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DistinctFacet()
      Create a saxon:distinct facet
